parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> If you set this parameter to the ID of a sharded cluster instance, you must also specify the **NodeId** parameter.

parameters.name: Database
parameters.description: The name of the database. By default, all databases are queried.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> The time range between the start time and the end time cannot exceed 24 hours. Otherwise, the operation fails.

parameters.name: Form
parameters.description:
The format of the returned audit records. Valid values:

- **File**: Triggers the generation of an audit log file. If you set this parameter to File, only common parameters are returned.

- **Stream** (default): Returns a data stream.

> The **File** parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: LogicalOperator
parameters.description: The logical operator for the keyword search. The default value is and.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of a Mongos node or a shard node in the sharded cluster instance.

> This parameter is available only when **DBInstanceId** is set to the ID of a sharded cluster instance.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order in which to sort the returned audit log entries by time. Valid values:

- **asc**: Sorts the entries in ascending order.

- **desc**: Sorts the entries in descending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. The value must be greater than 0 and must not exceed the maximum value of the integer data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30** (default), **50**, and **100**.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description: The keywords for the query. You can specify up to 10 keywords. Separate multiple keywords with spaces.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The database account. By default, all accounts are queried.
